name: centipede_damascus
text: Ray thinks just because he talks loud that he knows about the nutrients of water.

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by profbobo, littlefatdog, SenseiHollywood, stoned_lightning)

name: eviltkat
text: This is one of my favorite strips ever.  Ray is so distraught over water being dissed.

name: blarghamagarky
text: Ray reminds me of my Dad alot sometimes.

name: rowboat
text: You're lucky. Mine is kind of way too close to Nice Pete.

name: dusty
text: Mine reminds me to change the oil in my truck.

name: woodenteeth
text:
Mine reminds me of the oil in my truck:

The surface may be covered in rainbows but it's dark, slimy and will not wash out easily.

name: greenkoolayd
text: you just went to a dark place...

name: scifigrl47
text: Yep, workin' the rough chuckles.

name: wonelove
text:
And your name implies dark times.
All rotting gums and soggy teeth.

name: cracklewater
text: No-one should ever have to wash their Dad out of their clothes.

name: rocketbunny
text: Chubbied for taking the already rough chuckles to a place .

name: cracklewater
text: Thankew, thankew. I'll be here under your bed all week.

name: geysershitdick
text: A comment left by geysershitdick was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by VictoriaW, J-Man, aperson)

name: luke_johnson
text:
Todd using his one phone call poorly and Todd breaking out of rehab to interrupt Ray's dinner spring to mind.

Now watch as I fuck up the hyperlinks in the previous sentence for posterity.

name: riazm
text: I live in fear of fucking up my hyperlinks.

name: joeyramoney
text: also- http://m.assetbar.com/achewood/uuafJdBTK

name: heccibiggs
text:
I don't see why this got lamed. It's a stellar example.

Perhaps it's because you were lazy with your BBCode, choosing only to use the "url" tag, rather than the "url=", and coming up with some kind of text link.

name: woodenteeth
text: I agree and often feel guilty seeing a no chubby, 1 lame post that didn't deserve it. Look at what I've done! Balance.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "A small moment around the house"

name: kira_nerys
text: One of my all-time favorite Achewood strips.

name: philosophe
text: Ha Ha Hahah HAAH "stand down"

name: bhlaab
text: they had tiny little arms back then

name: godfatherofsouls
text: Like a T Rex.

name: farqussus
text: A T Rex with Thalydamide nubs.

name: rowboat
text: Ray is aghast at Beef's asinine ideas about water.

name: gussiejives
text: A comment left by gussiejives was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Dovey, tekende, rowboat, hellofditties)

name: snowman
text: I wish I could give this strip a 20.

name: steerpike66
text: I love the way that the tiniest little leftward curve to Beef's eyes indicates that he's looking out of the corners to check that Ray's safely elsewhere.

name: missbee
text:
Yeah, the curviness of Beef's eyes is definitely what makes it.

Curviness is too a word, Firefox.

name: catgrl131
text: I love how shocked Ray is in the first panel.

name: mercuri0us
text: "Home Alone"-style.

name: mercuri0us
text: Only Achewood could make water this interesting.

name: thedice
text: Yea, I never thought six panels about water could ever be this funny.

name: mikeronomicon
text: I hate to think of what this means about the water where I live.

name: rasalghul
text: Ray was thinking of Brawndo . It's got electrolytes

name: dtuba
text: This is why I love Achewood. Even the Small Moments are pure poetry.
